name: The king of Pool billiards
description:
Smoother ball movements, applied physical engine, control with all these.

Game Features:
- Single play: Step by step to exciting stages!
- Multiplayer support
- vs Play: Play with friends.
- Global leaderboards, fun achievements!
- Tablet support
